body_html:
Interestingly on a different machine, I had "conda install tensorflow" disconnect jupyter from the conda environment. Exact same issue as this thread. So tensorflow installation has messed with conda now in two different ways on two different machines. (both win 10).

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39604271/conda-environments-not-showing-up-in-jupyter-notebook

body:
Interestingly on a different machine, I had "conda install tensorflow" disconnect jupyter from the conda environment. Exact same issue as this thread. So tensorflow installation has messed with conda now in two different ways on two different machines. (both win 10).

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39604271/conda-environments-not-showing-up-in-jupyter-notebook
